body_html: Thanks @mrry , I will try version 1.5. By the way, does current implementation have any retry logic for network communication? For example the connection between worker and server is somehow closed abnormally, will worker reconnect to server without throwing any user aware exceptions? It should be able to do this as long as the server is still alive, right?

body: Thanks @mrry , I will try version 1.5. By the way, does current implementation have any retry logic for network communication? For example the connection between worker and server is somehow closed abnormally, will worker reconnect to server without throwing any user aware exceptions? It should be able to do this as long as the server is still alive, right?
